ch0108_00_nobori/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Thank you for riding
with us today!
ch0108_00_nobori/0101_0701_02_10: All aboard and headed for greater heights!
ch0108_00_nobori/7101_0701_01_10:
There don’t seem to be any railways here
on Pasio!
ch0108_00_nobori/7101_0701_02_10:
Although it’s not necessarily an inconvenience, it
does seem a bit lonely without them, don’t
you think?
ch0108_00_nobori/7101_0701_03_10:
Some may say that it’s better to go exploring
on foot...
ch0108_00_nobori/7101_0701_04_10:
But personally, it brings me great joy to transport
passengers to new challenges!
ch0108_00_nobori/7102_0701_01_10:
Here on Pasio, the combinations of sync pairs that
you team up with are important!
ch0108_00_nobori/7102_0701_02_10:
I actually have some experience with battles that
require teamwork!
ch0108_00_nobori/7102_0701_03_10:
I spent many a day partnering with Emmet and
battling passengers on the Multi Train...
ch0108_00_nobori/7102_0701_04_10:
All that experience is coming in handy here
on Pasio!
ch0108_00_nobori/7103_0701_01_10:
I look forward to battles with strong Trainers more
than anything else!
ch0108_00_nobori/7103_0701_02_10:
Seeing through your opponent’s tactics, taking
risks... It’s all so thrilling!
ch0108_00_nobori/7103_0701_03_10: Do you ever feel that way yourself?
ch0108_00_nobori/7103_0701_04_10:
I can’t get enough of that wonderful feeling of
figuring out an opponent’s strategy and landing a
solid hit on them!
ch0108_00_nobori/7104_0701_01_10:
Do you know about any other battle facilities
besides the Battle Subway?
ch0108_00_nobori/7104_0701_02_10:
I hear that in other regions, such facilities are
towers—and even trees!
ch0108_00_nobori/7104_0701_03_10:
Oh, I get it! Towers and trees are both things that
aim for greater heights, so they’re perfect for
Trainers who wish to do the same!
ch0108_00_nobori/7104_0701_04_10:
I suppose in that sense, our Battle Subway is a
place where you can delve deeper into battling!
ch0108_00_nobori/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Someone just told me
something that troubled me deeply!
ch0108_00_nobori/7105_0701_02_10: They said that compared to Emmet, I’m too stiff!
ch0108_00_nobori/7105_0701_03_10:
But that’s just a misunderstanding! I know I smile
when I’m having fun!
ch0108_00_nobori/7105_0701_04_10:
I’d even say that I’m quite proud of how
expressive I am when I speak!
ch0108_00_nobori/7105_0701_05_10:
What? You say you’ve never seen me smile?
I-is that so...
ch0108_00_nobori/1701_0701_01_10: I have a present for you! I hope it’s helpful!
ch0108_00_nobori/1701_0702_01_10:
Supporting people on their way to greater heights
is also part of my job!
ch0108_00_nobori/1701_0702_02_10: I hope this present will help you on your journey.
ch0108_00_nobori/2501_0701_01_10:
I know that Unova isn’t the only place that has
rail transportation.
ch0108_00_nobori/2501_0701_02_10:
For example, do you know about the Magnet Train
in Johto?
ch0108_00_nobori/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s so fast, you can travel between the two
regions it connects in no time at all!
ch0108_00_nobori/2501_0701_04_10:
If it were a Battle Magnet Train, you’d end up
at your destination faster than you could finish
your battle!
ch0108_00_nobori/2501_0702_01_10:
There’s also a super high-speed rail in Kalos
called the TMV!
ch0108_00_nobori/2501_0702_02_10:
There are so many famous railways around the
world. One day, I’d love to show them all to you!
ch0108_00_nobori/2511_0701_01_10:
My twin brother, Emmet, prefers the rules for
Double Battles.
ch0108_00_nobori/2511_0701_02_10:
He often teams up with me on the Multi Train,
where challengers come to battle us!
ch0108_00_nobori/2511_0701_03_10:
We Subway Bosses pride ourselves on being able
to win battles—even battles with special rules!
ch0108_00_nobori/2511_0701_04_10:
But the battles on Pasio are the first time we’ve
tried battling as a three-car train! It’s so exciting,
all I can say is...bravo!
ch0108_00_nobori/2511_0702_01_10: What kind of rules do you like to follow?
ch0108_00_nobori/2511_0702_02_10:
There are as many rules out there as there are
ways to win a battle... That’s what makes
Pokémon battles so interesting!
ch0108_00_nobori/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I know it’s early, but don’t forget
your safety checks. Always look both ways before
crossing the street. Come, let’s go!
ch0108_00_nobori/3003_0701_01_10:
Don’t be lulled to sleep by the afternoon
sunshine! It’s time to start up your engines
and get back on track!
ch0108_00_nobori/3005_0701_01_10:
Did you know that the Battle Subway is as
popular as ever during the evening rush hour?
We’re a well-oiled machine, my friend!
